trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 호스트 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn 클래스는 특수 한 유형의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>이미지를 표시 하는 호스트 셀 논리적으로 하는 데 사용 되는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewImageColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn에는 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>과 교차 하는 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 각 셀이 포함 될 수는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>의 값에 따라는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘을 표시 하는 것은 투명도 있는 이미지에 맞게 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 빈 셀 기본 오류 그래픽을 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 이 그래픽와 동일한 셀 값에 대 한 표시 하지 않으려면 `null` 또는 <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>셀 스타일 개체의 속성에서 반환 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성을 `null` 컨트롤에 행을 추가 하기 전에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 그러나이 없이 새 레코드에 대 한 행 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 레코드 오류 그래픽 새 행에 표시 되지 않도록 하려면 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>속성 값은 `true`, 또한 해야 셀 값을 명시적으로 설정 하거나 `null` 컨트롤에 대 한 처리기에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>이벤트 또는 열 집합 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>의 인스턴스에 대 한 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-파생 형식으로 재정의 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>반환 하는 속성 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열 형식에 대 한 기본 정렬 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> 형식의 셀 값에 사용할 수 있도록 구성 클래스 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자를 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>와 `valuesAreIcons` 매개 변수 값의 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> 클래스, 필요에 따라 사용할 수 있도록 구성 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> 셀 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 다음 속성을 설정 하 여 열을 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>속성이으로 초기화 된 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>는 `valuesAreIcons` 매개 변수 값입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>| 값은 `valuesAreIcons` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>속성입니다. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>속성입니다. | <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>형식의 표준 오류 그래픽 경우 `valuesAreIcons` 은 `true` 경우 <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>를 입력 하 고 `valuesAreIcons` 은 `false`. | 알파 채널 되도록 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>셀 값을 올바르게 그려집니다,이 생성자를 사용 하 여 한 `valuesAreIcons` 매개 변수 값의 `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 열에 있는 셀의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>속성 형식의 값으로 설정 될 것임을 나타내려면 <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 형식의 값으로 설정 될을 나타내려면 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 새 셀을 만드는 데 사용 되는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>새로 만든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> 이 속성을 초기화 하는 클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> 에 대 한 생성자

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 셀 서식 파일의 속성 변경 즉시 영향을 주지 것입니다 열의 기존 셀의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI).

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 열 다시 생성 한 후 이러한 변경 된 것만 (예를 들어 열 정렬 이나 호출을 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 있는 다른 열의 모든 셀에는 다음에 모델링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 집합 형식 종류와 호환 되지 않습니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 이 칼럼의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 셀의 열을 복제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 열의 기본 셀 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 반환 되는 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>초기 속성 값은 다음과 같습니다: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 속성 | 기본 값 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| 초기 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>속성 값이 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>형식의 표준 오류 그래픽 `true`, 그렇지 않으면 <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>형식의 표준 오류 그래픽. | 이러한 값에 지정 된 값을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤과 같지만 다른 셀 스타일 속성에 의해 재정의 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 표준 오류 그래픽을 표시 하지 않으려면 `null` 또는 <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>셀 값을 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>하기 위해이 셀 스타일 개체에 대 한 속성 `null` 또는 컨트롤에 행을 추가 하기 전에 사용자 고유의 오류 그래픽.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 그러나이 없이 새 레코드에 대 한 행 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 레코드 오류 그래픽 새 행에 표시 되지 않도록 하려면 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>속성 값은 `true`, 또한 해야 셀 값을 명시적으로 설정 하거나 `null` 또는 컨트롤에 대 한 처리기에서 사용자 고유의 오류 그래픽 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>이벤트 또는 열 집합 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>의 인스턴스에 대 한 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-파생 형식으로 재정의 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>반환 하는 속성 `null` 또는 사용자 고유의 오류 그래픽.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 속성에서 반환 되는 개체의 속성에는 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽에는 값 <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>로 변경 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>속성 값을 `true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽으로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동 설정</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>형식의 표준 오류 그래픽에는 값에 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>속성 값을 `false` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽으로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동 설정</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 기본 스타일으로 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: 열의 이미지를 설명 하는 문자열을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Description property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Description 속성을 사용 하 여 제공한 이미지를 설명 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: 이 설명은 이미지에 액세스할 수 있는 대안을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 또한 설명 텍스트 셀 값을 클립보드에 복사할 때 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>열의 모든 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: 열 이미지의 텍스트 설명입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열의 셀에 표시 된 아이콘을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 때 셀의 <> </> *> 속성이 설정 되어 있지 않고 셀의 <> </> *> 속성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Icon property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Icon 속성에 데이터 바인딩된 열의 경우 값이 없는 셀과 셀의 표시 되는 아이콘을 지정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>속성이 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 해당 셀에는 연결 된 이미지 없는 데이터 바인딩된 열에 대해 표준 오류 그래픽 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Using the Icon property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Icon 속성을 사용 하 여 보다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>속성 확인 알파 채널 아이콘에 그려집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>대신는 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>속성 대신 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the Icon property value.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>셀이 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 개별 셀의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>또는 아이콘 속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열의 셀에 표시 되는 이미지를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 때 셀의 <> </> *> 속성이 설정 되어 있지 않고 셀의 <> </> *> 속성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Image property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이미지 속성 지정에 사용할 수 없으면 데이터 바인딩된 열 값이 없는 셀과 셀의 표시 되는 이미지 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>속성이 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 해당 셀에는 연결 된 이미지 없는 데이터 바인딩된 열에 대해 표준 오류 그래픽 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>대신는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>속성 대신 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면의 알파 채널은 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>올바르게 그려집니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the Image or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>셀 이미지를 표시 하는지 여부를 나타내는 개별 셀의 속성 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>셀 값이 없을 때 속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: 이 열에 대 한 셀에 이미지 레이아웃을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> 셀 레이아웃을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설명 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>열을 설명 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 이 열의 셀에에서 표시 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 알파 채널 되도록 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>값 올바르게 그려집니다,이 속성을 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽에는 값은 <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, ValuesAreIcons 속성 값을 변경 `true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동으로 설정</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>형식의 표준 오류 그래픽에는 값에 <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, ValuesAreIcons 속성 값을 변경 `false` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> 형식의 표준 오류 그래픽으로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동 설정</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀 형식의 값을 표시 되 면 <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 셀 형식의 값을 표시 하는 경우 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>
